content.title: Intro
content.content:
1947
Preceded by

Year
1949

Tolkien-related events that took place in 1948.

content.title: January
content.content:
7 - Jarion Monroe, who would voice the King of the Dead in EA's The Return of the King, is born.
18 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes a letter to J.L.N. O'Loughlin.
18 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes to Rosemary
25 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes letter 113.

content.title: March
content.content: 1 - Actor Steven M. Kramer is born.

content.title: August
content.content:
5 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes letter 116.
20 - John Noble, who would play Denethor in The Lord of the Rings (film series), is born.

content.title: September
content.content:
8 - Artist Michael Hague is born.
14 - Around that date Tolkien completes the drafts of the final parts of The Lord of the Rings at the home of his son, Michael.
? - Tolkien visits Cambridge to view the Ancrene Wisse manuscript.

content.title: October
content.content:
14 - Narrator Gerard Murphy is born.
31 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes letter 117.
? - Katharine Farrer sends a letter to Tolkien expressing her opinions about the AinulindalÃ«.

? - Dick Plotz is born.
? - Studia Neophilologica Vol. 20, Nos. 1-2, containing an essay by J.R.R. Tolkien and S.R.T.O. d'Ardenne, is published.
Years
